participant_1.background:
I got lost in Tokyo and a kind stranger helped me find my way back to my hotel.
i do not like broccoli.
I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.
i like early 2000s indie music.
I eat healthy and exercise regularly to keep my body and mind young.

participant_2.background:
I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.
i am an angry person.
I'm not really close to my family, but I love my pet dogs.
my car has to be as fast as my motorcycle.
i work on a farm.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I am good! I just got back from a trip to Tokyo.
Oh, that sounds fun! Did you have a good time?
I did, I got lost a couple times, but a kind stranger helped me find my way back to my hotel.
That's great that you were able to find your way back! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I like to travel, and I'm always looking for new places to go.
I love to travel too! I've been to a few different countries, but I've always wanted to go to Japan.
It's a beautiful country, and the people are so friendly. You should definitely go sometime!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go horseback riding, and I love my dogs.
That sounds fun! I've never been horseback riding, but it's always looked like a lot of fun.
It is! It's a great way to get exercise and see the countryside.
I bet it is! I'm not really close to my family, but I love my pet dogs too.
Me too! Dogs are the best.
I agree! So, what do you do for work?
I work on a farm.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of hard work, but it's also probably very rewarding.
It is! I love working outdoors, and I love animals.
That's great! I'm glad you have a job that you enjoy.
Me too! So, what do you do for work?
I work in marketing.
Oh, that sounds interesting! What do you like about your job?
I like that I get to be creative, and I like working with people.
That sounds like a great job! I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thanks! Me too
